attributes.additional_details: today a ipsos survey of mps vote in secret for a 30 % wage rise in pay ipsos might agree to a 10 % rise over my dead body i say there should be a pay cut i am standing for the labour party in calthrope i just hope the public sign my petition to stop the greedy mp's in there tracks this shows that some mp's in the house of common only care about them self's .mark cherry banbury labour party
